name: Pal (itch)
description:
It's a small puzzle games where you control 2 cubes (separately or... wait for it! ... together!) and you have to move around, press buttons, and guide them to their target destinations!

Controls:
WASD - move around
E - switch cube
F - join cubes (they need to be next to each other)
O/P - previous/next level (if you get tired of one, or in case of any oddness :D )
